page.title: 15RECREATION_COPMANTHORPE
page.content: At the recreation centre,football, cricket,netball and bowls are played. There is a 5s and 3s dominoes league which is played by local people in the sports club.Football is popular with most.There are two football pitches C_ opmanthorpe has different aged teams ranging from the 12s and unders to the seniors.In between the football pitch_ es is the cricket square.Last year there were four or five teams but this year there are three. There is a six- teen and unders team and first and second team. The first and second team sometimes struggles to find a team,but the under sixteens have about sixteen people.For the tennis there are two c- ourts,there is a tennis club,you have to be a member to play.There are some tennis teams which play in leagues.On the tennis courts there is also a net- ball court,netball is played on Sunday
